name: Dezerters!
description:
DESCRIPTION

Run Dezerters!

You are group of guerilla puddings trying to escape evil kitchen.

  • Made with Unity during Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 
  • Theme: Stronger Together

CONTROLS

WASD - move
R - join with your friends
SPACE - split yourself
Scroll or O/P - choose another friend
E - activate environment

AUTHORS

Lexi Šebestová - Programming
Martin (Ricky) Medvec - Programming
Pavol (Melkor) Červeniak - Art & Design
Jakub @Hramelot Studios - Music & Sound
